typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ForthCoffee
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VanArdel
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MovieJson
ForthCoffee, VanArdel join(ForthCoffee@MovieID == VanArdel@MovieID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
